How long does it usually take to become connected? If it is under a minute I think we should just increase the timeout, rather than add yet another configuration environment variable
At least from what I've seen so far, it's commonly around 2 minutes. What do you think?

Good point to document it. I've added a comment, but I'm having a thought about adding it to `doc/environment-variables.md`: it looks like that md file only currently contains environment variables that affect the C-Core production library - test code, C++, etc. are not in there.... so I've added documentation to `tools/run_tests/performance/README.md` instead. That look ok?
